## Excel workbooks and other tools

**Purchase to NBD-Dirichlet**\
An MS-Excel workbook that takes a dataframe of customer-purchases and derives parameters for the Negative Binomial model and the Dirichlet model in a set of step-by-step worksheets. 

[Download the **Purchase to NBD** workbook](Purchase_to_NBD.xlsx){download}

**k Estimator**\
An MS-Excel macro workbook for estimating the NBD $k$ parameter from mean-category-purchases per period, $\mu$, and Observed proportion of non-buyers per period, $p(0)$.

[Download the **Estimate k** workbook](k_estimator.xlsm){download}

**Negative Binomial Probability Mass Function calculator**\
*NB_PMF_calculator* is an _MS-Excel_ workbook that estimates the probability of specific number of purchases based on the mean-category-purchases per period, ($\mu$) and the NBD $k$ parameter. Optionally, the worksheet estimates revenue from the NBD model. 

[Download the **NB_PMF_calculator** workbook](NB_PMF_calculator.xlsm){download}
